description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Tin: describing the chief methods of mining, dressing, & smelting it abroad ... With drawings, etc" Author: CHARLETON, Arthur George. Spon Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000667054 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
